EmailTemplate.name: Greg Burnett: Post-Introduction Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to VinSolutions!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Account.Name}:{!Account.AccountNumber}
Dear {!Account.Name} Team,
Welcome to VinSolutions! It was a pleasure speaking with you and I look forward to our next scheduled call. As your VinPro, I will be your personal advocate within the company. I will be providing assistance with escalated issues and to help you reach your fullest potential by helping you navigate through the system. As a VinPro, my days are typically filled with scheduled calls and meetings. In an effort to ensure you receive a timely response, please consider emailing me if I'm unavailable via phone.
Support related issues can be submitted via email, customer portal or by phone.
Email: support@vinsolutions.com
Phone: 1-800-980-7488
Customer Portal: This portal is where you can create a ticket, find questions to frequently asked questions and find helpful information to help you through the system.
In order to better assist you, please make sure you create a ticket with the support department and send me an email with the ticket number. By providing me this information, I can follow the ticket and make sure it gets resolved in a timely fashion.
I look forward to speaking with you soon. Please remember if you can't reach me by phone, you can email me. Also, if you have a support related issue you will need to create a ticket and email me the ticket number so I can follow up on the progress. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. Once again, Welcome to VinSolutions!
Greg Burnett I have been a VinPro with VinSolutions since August of 2011. Prior to that I was in the car business for six years and during that time I have worked in Sales, Business Development, and as a part of an Internet Department. Over those six years I have developed a solid understanding of the way a dealership works. My ambition is to leverage that experience along with my knowledge of our products to help my dealers get the most from VinSolutions.
Sincerely, Greg Burnett VinPro Mid-States Region VinSolutions.com greg.burnett@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x45815
We are always striving to improve our product and customer service. To reach this goal of excellence, we would love to hear from you! Please submit feedback of your experience, positive or negative, at VinCares@vinsolutions.com.
